details.description:
Myspace Exclusive! Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This 2 bedroom apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only # blocks from the L train, and a # minute walk to the JMZ trains
February 1 move in Small pets welcome No broker fee

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors

details.description:
Beautiful 1.5 bedroom apartment available in Williamsburg, prime location! Nice renovation!
This is the ideal opportunity to live in one of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Walk in to a spacious living area with an open kitchen and plenty of dining space. Large bedroom closet. Heat and hot water is included so no need to mind the thermostat. Enjoy a multitude of cafes in your community. Located just a few blocks to Williamsburg Smorgasburg/Flea Market. Cut your commute time to the city with the J, M, Z trains minutes from your door. Bring your small furry friends ? the building allows pets!
Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Domino Park, Williamsburg Bridge, etc nearby.
Small pets welcome

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors

details.description:
Beautifully NEWLY RENOVATED 1 bed in Williamsburg
Located at Rodney and South 4th 3 minutes door to platform ? Marcy JMZ
Brand new renovation with TONS of natural light New kitchen / bath Stainless steel appliances
Located directly at the entrance to the Williamsburg Bridge, this apartment perfect for any commute into the city. 3 blocks from the Marcy JMZ. 10 minute commute into the city. Around the corner from Broadway, which has everything you need.
Heat and Hot water are included This apartment is an amazing deal in this location, do not miss out!
Available 4/1 Small pets welcome

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances

details.description: Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building ($300/mo)- Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors

details.description:
77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Refrigerator/oven, Central A/C, Stainless steel appliances, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Easily practice safe social distancing with your own?Private. Unobstructed. Views. Of Manhattan. Built-in 2019, You?ll enjoy a generously-spaced 3-bed option, in the beautiful neighborhood of Astoria, yeah, green space and good bites, for days!
You?ll enjoy a super sun-lit 3 bedroom unit that can each room comfortably fit a queen-sized bed, dresser, tall wardrobe, make it your studio or even home gym or playroom for a little-one.
Make dinner without, having to clear your workspace all the time, and having a pet to help keep you company! After dinner, take a stroll through the neighborhood and check out everything.
Lucky for you you?re nestled on a residential block, close to shops, stores, and Transportation options are the N/Q at Broadway, and R/M at Steinway, an estimated 20 min. to Midtown? for those who commute.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Private Outdoor Space

details.description:
BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING nestled in the vibrant Greenpoint neighborhood!!
APARTMENT FEATURES: Gleaming Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Central Air Conditioning; Heating Inquire about the availability of Private Balconies
BUILDING AMENITIES: Rooftop Deck with Stunning Views Elevator for Convenience On-Site Laundry Rooms State-of-the-Art Fitness Center Recreational Room Comfortable Tenant Lounge Package Room for Deliveries Bike Storage Parking available($300 monthly) Pet-Friendly Environment First; Security - NO BROKER FEE.
Conveniently located near L train at Lorimer and right next to McCarren Park.

amenities.other: Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Balcony/Terrace

details.description:
BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING in the beautiful Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO!! Enjoy unbelievable views across both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Visit the countless parks nearby such as John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park and even more! Become a patron of some of the long standing and delicious LOCAL local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee and still enjoy those late night cravings spots we pretend we don't know and love (*cough Shake Shack) just a few blocks further. Take a little old school Brooklyn, mix in some new luxury living, and that's how you'll end up falling in love with your new home here!
Conveniently located off the A, C and F trains as well as the B57, B62, B69 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher; Microwave Central A/C; Heat Inquire for Private Balconies! Inquire for IN UNIT laundry!
BUILDING FEATURES: Courtyard Roof Deck Elevator Laundry Room Fitness Center Rec Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Bike Storage Pets Allowed
First; Security NO BROKER FEE

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Elevated Living at 527 Grand Ave in Prospect Heights
2 bedroom with 2 bath!
Welcome to 527 Grand Ave, a luxury community perfectly nestled in the vibrant Prospect Heights neighborhood. Offering 1 and 2 bedroom residences with spacious layouts, premium finishes, and thoughtful design, this property redefines modern living. Tons of natural sunlight throughout.
Residents enjoy unparalleled amenities, including: - A state-of-the-art fitness center - Expansive rooftop terrace with stunning skyline views - Dedicated children?s playroom - Business conference room for remote work and meetings - Convenient elevator access
Neighborhood Highlights: Prospect Heights is a blend of historic charm and contemporary culture. Stroll down tree-lined streets to uncover trendy restaurants, cozy cafes, and boutique shops. The iconic Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, and Brooklyn Museum are just steps away, offering lush green spaces and endless cultural experiences. Excellent transit options, including the A and C trains, make commuting to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn a breeze.
Live where convenience meets character. Schedule your tour today and make 527 Grand Ave your new home!

amenities.other: A/C, Dishwasher, Stainless steel appliances, Hardwood Floors, Central A/C, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Luxury 2-Bedroom, 2-Bath Apartment in Prime Astoria!
Step into this stunning 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment in the heart of Astoria, offering a perfect blend of modern comfort and convenience. Featuring hardwood floors throughout, this spacious home boasts a sleek kitchen with stainless steel appliances, ideal for cooking and entertaining. Enjoy the comfort of central AC and the convenience of a doorman building, ensuring security and concierge services. Located in a vibrant neighborhood, you?ll be close to top restaurants, caf?s, parks, and easy subway access to Manhattan. Don't miss this exceptional home!

This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. Washer/dryer, dishwasher, central AC.
You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. details.description:
Explore refined living in this 2 Bed / 2 Bath at 144 West St in Greenpoint, Brooklyn.
HUGE BALCONY!
This boutique residence is nestled along the vibrant East River Waterfront, offering spacious layouts and elegant interiors. With floor-to-ceiling windows and warm oakwood floors, the unit is filled with natural light and inviting design. The kitchen boasts custom ivory cabinetry, sleek white quartz countertops, and Bosch stainless steel appliances, while the in-unit washer and dryer add modern convenience. The bathroom is your private retreat with a deep soaking tub. This pet-friendly building is also conveniently close to the G train at Greenpoint Avenue, making your commute a breeze.

Stainless steel kitchen with dishwasher and microwave. Oak wood floors. One fully tiled bathroom with a large soaking tub. Central air and central heating. Laundry in unit!Building features media room, Gym with a sauna, recreational room featuring a pool table, ping pong table, air hockey. Bike storage.An amazing roof with great views of the city.Garage. Near the Shuttle,2,3,4,5 and C trains. Near Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, Bergen Beer Garden and Franklin Ave trendy restaurants and bars.

details.description: Virtual tours available!Do not miss out on this 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhood's easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

details.description:
Welcome to 92 Moore, Apartment 3R, where spaciousness meets convenience.
This impressive apartment offers a generous layout with two bedrooms and two bathrooms.
Situated as a corner unit, you'll enjoy an abundance of natural light and a sense of privacy.
The master bedroom boasts a private en suite bathroom, providing a retreat-like experience.
The expansive living space offers ample room to relax and entertain guests.
Perfect! The bedrooms are conveniently located on opposite sides of the apartment, ensuring privacy and comfort.
Discover ample closet space throughout, allowing for convenient storage and organization.
Sunlight streams through the windows, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.
Don't miss the opportunity to make 92 Moore, Apartment 3R, your new home. Experience the luxury of space, natural light, and modern amenities in this desirable living environment.
